attributes.action: Remove children from the 'rule of six' that bans gatherings of seven or more.
attributes.additional_details:
Our children have suffered massively throughout this epidemic, it is not yet known what the long term detrimental effect on their mental health will be.

To ban them from seeing their families, holding birthday parties and ruining Christmas is not acceptable.

If COVID-19 is spreading amongst our young adults, the wrong group are being punished.
attributes.background: Children should be removed from the “rule of 6” as they have been in Scotland.

rejection.details:
